name: politico

name: politico
text: In the 1980s, Trump started tangling with the NFL because he wanted to be in the NFL, looking into buying the Baltimore (not yet Indianapolis) Colts and the New England Patriots https://t.co/UVRDlN6OCz

name: politico
text: In 2014, he tried again, and failed again, when he at least talked about proffering a (not big enough) billion-dollar bid for the Buffalo Bills https://t.co/UVRDlN6OCz

name: politico
text: During Trump‚Äôs first fall as president, when the NFL scrambled to respond to his tweeted attacks and fretted over the loss of sponsors and fans, his swaggering new influence over the owners who repeatedly had rejected him amounted to a measure of revenge https://t.co/UVRDlN6OCz

name: politico
text: Now, though, in the wake of the tumult of the past two months, the test for the president is whether he still has such sway‚Äîor if the rapid change means a weakened Trump is sufficiently out of step with an altered electorate and headed for defeat https://t.co/UVRDlN6OCz
